This is the homepage for StatQuest Workshop taught by Dr. Kat Cheng & [Meg Hokama](https://meganhokama.github.io/website/) at The University of Arizona. All workshop materials will be posted on this site.

You can find the course schedule [here](index.qmd).

|----------|-------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------|
| Workshop | Weaver Science and Engineering Library Rm 212 or Zoom | 6/09 - 6/12 (10 am to 12 pm)|
